comment: Deduce a group from its properties. ` N ` (negative) is normally dependent on ` x ` i.e. read it as ` N ( x ) ` . Note: normally we don't use a ` ph ` antecedent on hypotheses that name structure components, since they can be eliminated with ~ eqid , but we make an exception for theorems such as ~ isgrpd2 , ~ ismndd , and ~ islmodd since theorems using them often rewrite the structure components. (Contributed by NM, 10-Aug-2013.)
